dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT COUNT(1) total FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT sh.shipment_xid, (SELECT orel.order_release_xid FROM order_release orel WHERE orel.order_release_gid = vsor.order_release_gid) order_release_xid, (SELECT oob.order_base_xid FROM ob_order_base oob, order_release orel WHERE oob.order_base_gid = orel.order_base_gid AND orel.order_release_gid = vsor.order_release_gid) order_base_xid, TO_CHAR(ROUND(sh.total_actual_cost,2),'999999990.00') shipment_cost, sh.t_actual_cost_currency_gid shipment_uom, (SELECT packaged_item_xid FROM packaged_item pi WHERE pi.packaged_item_gid = orl.packaged_item_gid) commodity_code, vsor.order_release_gid, (SELECT loc.location_name||decode(loc.city,NULL,NULL,', '||loc.city)||decode(loc.province_code,NULL,NULL,', '||loc.province_code)||decode(loc.postal_code,NULL,NULL,', '||loc.postal_code)||decode(loc.country_code3_gid,NULL,NULL,', '||loc.country_code3_gid) FROM location loc WHERE loc.location_gid = sh.dest_location_gid) deliver_to, sh.dest_location_gid, (SELECT loc.location_name||decode(loc.city,NULL,NULL,', '||loc.city)||decode(loc.province_code,NULL,NULL,', '||loc.province_code)||decode(loc.postal_code,NULL,NULL,', '||loc.postal_code)||decode(loc.country_code3_gid,NULL,NULL,', '||loc.country_code3_gid) FROM location loc WHERE loc.location_gid = sh.source_location_gid) source_loc, TO_CHAR(sh.end_time,'MM/DD/YYYY') DELIVERY_DATE, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(ssur.remark_text,'yyyy-mm-dd'),'MM/DD/YYYY') bl_date, (SELECT c.contact_xid FROM shipment_involved_party sip JOIN contact c ON sip.involved_party_contact_gid = c.contact_gid WHERE sip.shipment_gid = sh.shipment_gid AND sip.involved_party_qual_gid = 'CUSTOMER') customer_id, TO_CHAR((ROUND(GLOGOWNER.XXSCOU_FUEL_SURCHARGE_PKG.xxscou_get_fuel_surcharge_fcn ( sh.shipment_gid, sh.transport_mode_gid, vsor.order_release_gid),2)),'999999990.00') Fuel, DECODE(GLOGOWNER.XXSCOU_FUEL_SURCHARGE_PKG.xxscou_get_fuel_surcharge_fcn ( sh.shipment_gid, sh.transport_mode_gid, vsor.order_release_gid),NULL,NULL,(SELECT DISTINCT cost_currency_gid FROM allocation_order_release_d WHERE order_release_gid = vsor.order_release_gid)) Fuel_uom, TO_CHAR((ROUND(GLOGOWNER.XXSCOU_FUEL_SURCHARGE_PKG.xxscou_get_freight_fcn ( sh.shipment_gid, sh.transport_mode_gid, vsor.order_release_gid),2)),'999999990.00') Freight, DECODE(GLOGOWNER.XXSCOU_FUEL_SURCHARGE_PKG.xxscou_get_freight_fcn ( sh.shipment_gid, sh.transport_mode_gid, vsor.order_release_gid),NULL,NULL,(SELECT DISTINCT cost_currency_gid FROM allocation_order_release_d WHERE order_release_gid = vsor.order_release_gid)) Freight_uom, TO_CHAR(ROUND(sh.loaded_distance,2),'999999990.00') mileage, sref.shipment_refnum_value loc_code FROM shipment sh, shipment_stop_d sstopd, s_ship_unit ssu, s_ship_unit_remark ssur, shipment_status ss, status_type st, status_value sv, shipment_refnum sref, view_shipment_order_Release vsor, order_release_refnum orr, order_release_refnum_qual orrq, order_release_line orl WHERE sh.shipment_gid = ss.shipment_gid AND sstopd.shipment_gid = sh.shipment_gid AND ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = sstopd.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssur.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssur.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.TRAN ID DATE' AND TRUNC(NVL(TO_DATE(NVL(REGEXP_SUBSTR(ssur.remark_text,'^[0-9]{4}-[0-1][0-9]-[0-3][0-9]$'),SYSDATE),'yyyy-mm-dd'),SYSDATE)) >= NVL(TO_DATE(NVL(:P_START_DATE,'1900-01-01'),'yyyy-mm-dd'),TRUNC(NVL(TO_DATE(NVL(REGEXP_SUBSTR(ssur.remark_text,'^[0-9]{4}-[0-1][0-9]-[0-3][0-9]$'),SYSDATE),'yyyy-mm-dd'),SYSDATE))) AND TRUNC(NVL(TO_DATE(NVL(REGEXP_SUBSTR(ssur.remark_text,'^[0-9]{4}-[0-1][0-9]-[0-3][0-9]$'),SYSDATE),'yyyy-mm-dd'),SYSDATE)) <= NVL(TO_DATE(NVL(:P_END_DATE,'2999-01-01'),'yyyy-mm-dd'),TRUNC(NVL(TO_DATE(NVL(REGEXP_SUBSTR(ssur.remark_text,'^[0-9]{4}-[0-1][0-9]-[0-3][0-9]$'),SYSDATE),'yyyy-mm-dd'),SYSDATE))) AND ss.status_type_gid = st.status_type_gid AND st.status_type_xid = 'SAR_AS400' AND ss.status_value_gid = sv.status_value_gid AND ss.status_type_gid = sv.status_type_gid AND sref.shipment_gid = sh.shipment_gid AND sref.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.LOC_CODE' AND orl.order_release_gid = vsor.order_release_gid AND sv.status_value_xid = 'SAR_AS400_YES' AND vsor.shipment_gid = sh.shipment_gid AND orr.order_release_gid = vsor.order_release_gid AND orr.order_release_refnum_qual_gid = orrq.order_release_refnum_qual_gid AND orrq.order_release_refnum_qual_xid = 'PLUS FUEL SURCHARGE' AND orr.order_release_refnum_value = 'Y' AND NVL(sref.shipment_refnum_value,-999) IN (SELECT NVL(SUBSTR (the_string, DECODE (LEVEL,1, 1,INSTR (the_string,',',1,LEVEL - 1)+ 1), DECODE (INSTR (the_string, ',',1,LEVEL),0, LENGTH (the_string),INSTR (the_string,',',1,LEVEL) - DECODE (LEVEL, 1, 0, INSTR (the_string,',',1,LEVEL - 1))- 1)),NVL(sref.shipment_refnum_value,-999)) the_value FROM (SELECT TRIM(:P_LOC_CODE) the_string FROM DUAL) CONNECT BY LEVEL <= LENGTH (the_string) - LENGTH (REPLACE (the_string, ',')) + 1) AND NVL(sh.shipment_gid,-999) IN (SELECT NVL(SUBSTR (the_string, DECODE (LEVEL,1, 1,INSTR (the_string,',',1,LEVEL - 1)+ 1), DECODE (INSTR (the_string, ',',1,LEVEL),0, LENGTH (the_string),INSTR (the_string,',',1,LEVEL) - DECODE (LEVEL,1, 0,INSTR (the_string,',',1,LEVEL - 1))- 1)),NVL(sh.shipment_gid,-999)) the_value FROM (SELECT TRIM(:P_SHIPMENT_ID) the_string FROM DUAL) CONNECT BY LEVEL <= LENGTH (the_string) - LENGTH (REPLACE (the_string, ',')) + 1) AND NVL(sh.source_location_gid,-999) IN (SELECT NVL(SUBSTR (the_string, DECODE (LEVEL,1, 1,INSTR (the_string,',',1,LEVEL - 1)+ 1), DECODE (INSTR (the_string, ',',1,LEVEL),0, LENGTH (the_string),INSTR (the_string,',',1,LEVEL) - DECODE (LEVEL,1, 0, INSTR (the_string, ',', 1, LEVEL - 1)) - 1)),NVL(sh.source_location_gid,-999)) the_value FROM (SELECT TRIM(:P_ORIGIN) the_string FROM DUAL) CONNECT BY LEVEL <=LENGTH (the_string) - LENGTH (REPLACE (the_string, ',')) + 1) AND NVL(sh.dest_location_gid,-999) IN (SELECT NVL(SUBSTR (the_string, DECODE (LEVEL,1, 1,INSTR (the_string,',',1,LEVEL - 1)+ 1), DECODE (INSTR (the_string, ',',1,LEVEL),0, LENGTH (the_string),INSTR (the_string,',',1,LEVEL) - DECODE (LEVEL,1, 0, INSTR (the_string, ',', 1, LEVEL - 1)) - 1)),NVL(sh.dest_location_gid,-999)) the_value FROM (SELECT TRIM(:P_DESTINATION) the_string FROM DUAL) CONNECT BY LEVEL <=LENGTH (the_string) - LENGTH (REPLACE (the_string, ',')) + 1) ORDER BY TO_DATE(bl_date,'mm/dd/yyyy') DESC )

SELECT DISTINCT sh.shipment_xid, (SELECT orel.order_release_xid FROM order_release orel WHERE orel.order_release_gid = vsor.order_release_gid) order_release_xid, (SELECT oob.order_base_xid FROM ob_order_base oob, order_release orel WHERE oob.order_base_gid = orel.order_base_gid AND orel.order_release_gid = vsor.order_release_gid) order_base_xid, TO_CHAR(ROUND(sh.total_actual_cost,2),'999999990.00') shipment_cost, sh.t_actual_cost_currency_gid shipment_uom, (SELECT packaged_item_xid FROM packaged_item pi WHERE pi.packaged_item_gid = orl.packaged_item_gid) commodity_code, vsor.order_release_gid, (SELECT loc.location_name||decode(loc.city,NULL,NULL,', '||loc.city)||decode(loc.province_code,NULL,NULL,', '||loc.province_code)||decode(loc.postal_code,NULL,NULL,', '||loc.postal_code)||decode(loc.country_code3_gid,NULL,NULL,', '||loc.country_code3_gid) FROM location loc WHERE loc.location_gid = sh.dest_location_gid) deliver_to, sh.dest_location_gid, (SELECT loc.location_name||decode(loc.city,NULL,NULL,', '||loc.city)||decode(loc.province_code,NULL,NULL,', '||loc.province_code)||decode(loc.postal_code,NULL,NULL,', '||loc.postal_code)||decode(loc.country_code3_gid,NULL,NULL,', '||loc.country_code3_gid) FROM location loc WHERE loc.location_gid = sh.source_location_gid) source_loc, TO_CHAR(sh.end_time,'MM/DD/YYYY') DELIVERY_DATE, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(ssur.remark_text,'yyyy-mm-dd'),'MM/DD/YYYY') bl_date, (SELECT c.contact_xid FROM shipment_involved_party sip JOIN contact c ON sip.involved_party_contact_gid = c.contact_gid WHERE sip.shipment_gid = sh.shipment_gid AND sip.involved_party_qual_gid = 'CUSTOMER') customer_id, TO_CHAR((ROUND(GLOGOWNER.XXSCOU_FUEL_SURCHARGE_PKG.xxscou_get_fuel_surcharge_fcn ( sh.shipment_gid, sh.transport_mode_gid, vsor.order_release_gid),2)),'999999990.00') Fuel, DECODE(GLOGOWNER.XXSCOU_FUEL_SURCHARGE_PKG.xxscou_get_fuel_surcharge_fcn ( sh.shipment_gid, sh.transport_mode_gid, vsor.order_release_gid),NULL,NULL,(SELECT DISTINCT cost_currency_gid FROM allocation_order_release_d WHERE order_release_gid = vsor.order_release_gid)) Fuel_uom, TO_CHAR((ROUND(GLOGOWNER.XXSCOU_FUEL_SURCHARGE_PKG.xxscou_get_freight_fcn ( sh.shipment_gid, sh.transport_mode_gid, vsor.order_release_gid),2)),'999999990.00') Freight, DECODE(GLOGOWNER.XXSCOU_FUEL_SURCHARGE_PKG.xxscou_get_freight_fcn ( sh.shipment_gid, sh.transport_mode_gid, vsor.order_release_gid),NULL,NULL,(SELECT DISTINCT cost_currency_gid FROM allocation_order_release_d WHERE order_release_gid = vsor.order_release_gid)) Freight_uom, TO_CHAR(ROUND(sh.loaded_distance,2),'999999990.00') mileage, sref.shipment_refnum_value loc_code FROM shipment sh, shipment_stop_d sstopd, s_ship_unit ssu, s_ship_unit_remark ssur, shipment_status ss, status_type st, status_value sv, shipment_refnum sref, view_shipment_order_Release vsor, order_release_refnum orr, order_release_refnum_qual orrq, order_release_line orl WHERE sh.shipment_gid = ss.shipment_gid AND sstopd.shipment_gid = sh.shipment_gid AND ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = sstopd.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssur.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssur.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.TRAN ID DATE' AND TRUNC(NVL(TO_DATE(NVL(REGEXP_SUBSTR(ssur.remark_text,'^[0-9]{4}-[0-1][0-9]-[0-3][0-9]$'),SYSDATE),'yyyy-mm-dd'),SYSDATE)) >= NVL(TO_DATE(NVL(:P_START_DATE,'1900-01-01'),'yyyy-mm-dd'),TRUNC(NVL(TO_DATE(NVL(REGEXP_SUBSTR(ssur.remark_text,'^[0-9]{4}-[0-1][0-9]-[0-3][0-9]$'),SYSDATE),'yyyy-mm-dd'),SYSDATE))) AND TRUNC(NVL(TO_DATE(NVL(REGEXP_SUBSTR(ssur.remark_text,'^[0-9]{4}-[0-1][0-9]-[0-3][0-9]$'),SYSDATE),'yyyy-mm-dd'),SYSDATE)) <= NVL(TO_DATE(NVL(:P_END_DATE,'2999-01-01'),'yyyy-mm-dd'),TRUNC(NVL(TO_DATE(NVL(REGEXP_SUBSTR(ssur.remark_text,'^[0-9]{4}-[0-1][0-9]-[0-3][0-9]$'),SYSDATE),'yyyy-mm-dd'),SYSDATE))) AND ss.status_type_gid = st.status_type_gid AND st.status_type_xid = 'SAR_AS400' AND ss.status_value_gid = sv.status_value_gid AND ss.status_type_gid = sv.status_type_gid AND sref.shipment_gid = sh.shipment_gid AND sref.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.LOC_CODE' AND orl.order_release_gid = vsor.order_release_gid AND sv.status_value_xid = 'SAR_AS400_YES' AND vsor.shipment_gid = sh.shipment_gid AND orr.order_release_gid = vsor.order_release_gid AND orr.order_release_refnum_qual_gid = orrq.order_release_refnum_qual_gid AND orrq.order_release_refnum_qual_xid = 'PLUS FUEL SURCHARGE' AND orr.order_release_refnum_value = 'Y' AND NVL(sref.shipment_refnum_value,-999) IN (SELECT NVL(SUBSTR (the_string, DECODE (LEVEL,1, 1,INSTR (the_string,',',1,LEVEL - 1)+ 1), DECODE (INSTR (the_string, ',',1,LEVEL),0, LENGTH (the_string),INSTR (the_string,',',1,LEVEL) - DECODE (LEVEL, 1, 0, INSTR (the_string,',',1,LEVEL - 1))- 1)),NVL(sref.shipment_refnum_value,-999)) the_value FROM (SELECT TRIM(:P_LOC_CODE) the_string FROM DUAL) CONNECT BY LEVEL <= LENGTH (the_string) - LENGTH (REPLACE (the_string, ',')) + 1) AND NVL(sh.shipment_gid,-999) IN (SELECT NVL(SUBSTR (the_string, DECODE (LEVEL,1, 1,INSTR (the_string,',',1,LEVEL - 1)+ 1), DECODE (INSTR (the_string, ',',1,LEVEL),0, LENGTH (the_string),INSTR (the_string,',',1,LEVEL) - DECODE (LEVEL,1, 0,INSTR (the_string,',',1,LEVEL - 1))- 1)),NVL(sh.shipment_gid,-999)) the_value FROM (SELECT TRIM(:P_SHIPMENT_ID) the_string FROM DUAL) CONNECT BY LEVEL <= LENGTH (the_string) - LENGTH (REPLACE (the_string, ',')) + 1) AND NVL(sh.source_location_gid,-999) IN (SELECT NVL(SUBSTR (the_string, DECODE (LEVEL,1, 1,INSTR (the_string,',',1,LEVEL - 1)+ 1), DECODE (INSTR (the_string, ',',1,LEVEL),0, LENGTH (the_string),INSTR (the_string,',',1,LEVEL) - DECODE (LEVEL,1, 0, INSTR (the_string, ',', 1, LEVEL - 1)) - 1)),NVL(sh.source_location_gid,-999)) the_value FROM (SELECT TRIM(:P_ORIGIN) the_string FROM DUAL) CONNECT BY LEVEL <=LENGTH (the_string) - LENGTH (REPLACE (the_string, ',')) + 1) AND NVL(sh.dest_location_gid,-999) IN (SELECT NVL(SUBSTR (the_string, DECODE (LEVEL,1, 1,INSTR (the_string,',',1,LEVEL - 1)+ 1), DECODE (INSTR (the_string, ',',1,LEVEL),0, LENGTH (the_string),INSTR (the_string,',',1,LEVEL) - DECODE (LEVEL,1, 0, INSTR (the_string, ',', 1, LEVEL - 1)) - 1)),NVL(sh.dest_location_gid,-999)) the_value FROM (SELECT TRIM(:P_DESTINATION) the_string FROM DUAL) CONNECT BY LEVEL <=LENGTH (the_string) - LENGTH (REPLACE (the_string, ',')) + 1) ORDER BY TO_DATE(bl_date,'mm/dd/yyyy') DESC
select trim(to_char(sysdate,'FMDay,Month DD, yyyy ')) CURR_DATE from dual
